An equality theorem for substitution.  Used in proof of Theorem 9.7 in [Megill] p. 449 (p. 16 of the preprint).  (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.)

 An equality theorem for substitution.  Used in proof of Theorem 9.7 in [Megill] p. 449 (p. 16 of the preprint).  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement: sbequ $p |- ( x = y -> ( [ x / z ] ph <-> [ y / z ] ph ) ) $.
